visibilityRule.booleanFilter: NOT (1) AND NOT (2) AND 3 AND NOT (4) AND NOT (5)

componentInstanceProperties.name: richTextValue
componentInstanceProperties.value:
• Quote creation and Order form generation can be done at any stage.
  • For Quote creation, click on Quotes in above related list section
  • Only deals in "Deal confirmation" stage can be sent for finance approval
  • Enter Billing GSTIN below and click on "Fetch Company info" button above to auto-fill customer data from GSTIN verification API.
